column1: Happy Albanian Independence Day to all celebrating throughout #NY13.   Although this year’s celebration looks differently due to the ongoing #COVID19 pandemic we stand united to recognize the occasion of the 108th anniversary of Albania’s Independence.  https://t.co/oIYJqt8wne

This #Thanksgiving may look different this year due to social distancing.   Be safe.   Be smart.   Listen to the advice of public health experts when planning your celebration. #Thanksgiving2020

And  I welcome members of the community who are interested in joining me to recognize the loss of a true New York City titan #MayorDavidDinkins https://t.co/6DR8sv3Vps

Likewise Harlem lost one of its native sons – a true political giant who always fought for his community and for the “little guy”. To honor his memory and service I will be laying a wreath at the Adam Clayton Powell Jr. statue at 12:00 PM (Noon) tomorrow.
(Thread) The nation lost an icon with the tragic passing of Mayor David Dinkins who brought a wind of transformative progressive change to NYC and beyond during his decades of public service.

Happening today at 4pm https://t.co/L6ADscPHjQ

He dedication his life to public service and played a tremendous role in shaping our city. Mayor Dinkins meant so much to me as a friend he meant the world to Harlem and Harlem equally to him. His legacy will forever be cherished & will never be forgotten. May he Rest In Peace.
Words truly cannot express my thoughts and heartfelt sorrow following the news of the passing of my dear friend and mentor Mayor David Dinkins. https://t.co/9hI8HjFC13

Working together we can help increase citizen security build resilience to natural disasters caused by #climatechange and improve strategies to reduce illegal narcotics trafficking.
Too often the Caribbean is ignored & we must correct this by deepening our partnerships & cooperation with some of our closest allies.
My bill the Caribbean Basin Security Initiative Authorization Act would allocate nearly $75000000 per year from 2021 through 2025 to improve security cooperation with Caribbean nations.

I'm delighted to have the support of @HouseDemocrats and my colleagues to pass my #CBSI legislation to combat drug trafficking and promote good governance and independent justice sectors in the Caribbean.

Now the Senate must step up act and pass this important piece of legislation because the survivors of major disasters need relief NOW! w/ @SenWarren @OxfamAmerica @NLIHC
This is a critical effort to relieve survivors from having to notarize documents or furnish deeds for their homes before receiving relief an impossible task for many in the wake of natural disasters.

Delighted the House passed my bill the Housing Survivors of Major Disasters Act today which provides financial assistance for land surveys and other costs associated with Disaster Housing Assistance Program’s application process.
